title: sen-grid
body: The grid is a powerful mobile-first flexbox system for building custom layouts.
It is composed of three units â€” a grid,

. Columns will expand to fill the row, and will resize to fit additsenal columns. It is based on a 12 column layout with different breakpoints based on the screen size. The number of columns can be customized using CSS.

props.name: fixed
props.docs: If true, the grid will have a fixed width based on the screen size.

docs:
The grid is a powerful mobile-first flexbox system for building custom layouts.

It is composed of three units â€” a grid, [row(s)](../row) and [column(s)](../col). Columns will expand to fill the row, and will resize to fit additsenal columns. It is based on a 12 column layout with different breakpoints based on the screen size. The number of columns can be customized using CSS.

See the [Responsive Grid documentatsen](/docs/layout/grid) for more informatsen.
